hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Map of the Deku Tree# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #the Fire Temple Boss Key# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right
